Package clientSide.stubs

Class KitchenStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.stubs.KitchenStub
  • public class KitchenStub
extends Object
    Stub to the Kitchen. It instantiates a remote reference to the kitchen. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      KitchenStub​(String hostName, int port)
      Instantiation of a remote reference

        Instantiation of a remote reference

        public void watchTheNews()
        Operation watch the news. It is called by the chef that is watching the news waiting for the order.

        Operation start preparation. It is called by the chef to start preparation.

      • getFirstCourse

        public boolean getFirstCourse()
        Operation get first course. It is called by the chef to check if he is preparing the first course or not.
        Returns:
        true, if chef is preparing the first course - false, otherwise

      • proceedToPresentation

        public void proceedToPresentation()
        Operation proceed to presentation. It is called by the chef to proceed to the presentation of the dish.

      • haveAllPortionsBeenDelivered

        public boolean haveAllPortionsBeenDelivered()
        Operation have all portions been delivered. It is called by the chef to check if all portions have been delivered.
        Returns:
        true, if all portions have been delivered - false, otherwise

      • haveNextPortionReady

        public void haveNextPortionReady()
        Operation have next portion ready. It is called by the chef to start preparing the next portion.

        Operation set first course It is called by the chef to set the first course.
        Parameters:
        b - true, if the chef is preparing the first course - false, otherwise

      • hasTheOrderBeenCompleted

        public boolean hasTheOrderBeenCompleted()
        Operation has the order been completed. It is called by the chef to check if the order has been completed.
        Returns:
        true, if the order is complete - false, otherwise

        public void cleanUp()
        Operation clean up. It is called by the chef when the order is complete to clean up.

        public void chefWaitForCollection​(int chefState)
